function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited awareness and education among building professionals about the impact of their decisions on occupant health","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration between building practitioners, health professionals, and data scientists in enhancing the design of healthy buildings.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of establishment of building design guidelines as a standard for the design of healthy buildings.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of professional certification for healthy building design among design professionals.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding about the effects of buildings attributes on occupant health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective collaboration between project stakeholders","category":"Collaboration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance to share personal data is a significant challenge for achieving the design and operation of buildings that support and promote occupant health.","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disparities in health conditions based on income and race","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased focus on occupant health in building design and operation due to recent pandemic.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Generalizing results from a sample dominated by engineers, architects, and facility managers","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased focus on physical and mental well-being in building occupant health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on questionnaires as the primary method for studying and measuring occupant health may lead to incomplete or biased data.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Major focus on office buildings in research studies and practice-based efforts may neglect other types of buildings that also impact occupant health.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding about the effect of building attributes on occupant health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of an effective collaboration framework between different stakeholders of a building","category":"Collaboration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns, reluctance to share data, and difficulty in defining quantitative metrics","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of interdisciplinary collaboration in promoting occupant health","category":"Collaboration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider the trade-off and synergies between energy efficiency, sustainability, and occupant health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emerging environmental concerns such as climate change and pollution may lead to an increased risk of contagious diseases in buildings.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality due to contaminants from outdoor and indoor sources","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated negative emotions, aggressive behaviors, and mental fatigue due to indoor air contaminants","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency between ventilation rates and respiratory symptoms in single-family houses and sick building syndromes in offices","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of exposure to natural light affecting mood, sleep quality, and vitamin d levels","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate access to natural views contributing to job stress in office workers","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noise pollution in buildings from various sources impacting occupant well-being and health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of widely accepted occupant health assessment standard","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complicated and coupled factors affecting occupant health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through contact with shared biomarker measurement devices , thermal cameras, sensors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased infection through contact with commonly touched surfaces during occupant health assessments , survey instruments","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of discussion and consideration of contagious disease transmission risk in the literature on occupant health assessment tools","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent findings in the impact of green buildings on occupants’ health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory findings in the impact of green buildings on mental and physical well-being of occupants","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration between social, environmental scientists and engineers in developing a framework of health in the built environment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gap in translating science-based evidence and solutions to reduce health risks in the built environment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in indoor office environments","category":"Health, Working","confidence":"High, Medium"},{"name":"Impact of musculoskeletal disorders on economic burden","category":"Health, Wealth production","confidence":"High, Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic highlighting the importance of hvac design and operations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standard-62.1 and standard-90.1 focus on thermal comfort, ventilation, and energy efficiency without considering pandemics, potentially leading to inadequate measures for controlling contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper hvac operation during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear ventilation rate guidelines for minimizing airborne virus transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate on the applicability and use of the wells-riley model for estimating infection risk during covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of quanta correlation for sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to non-wearable sensor systems","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrusiveness and effectiveness of wearable sensor systems","category":"Privacy, Health","confidence":"Medium, Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the link between building and occupant parameters and their impacts on physical, mental, and social health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalizability and longitudinal studies in existing research on occupant health in buildings","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Siloed expertise in building science community and lack of integrated understanding of lighting, air, noise, and temperature impacts on occupants","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy risks and security breaches from iot devices and data collection","category":"Privacy, Security","confidence":"High, Medium"}]}
